parametrized_description: A farmer has TotalLand acres to cultivate turnips and pumpkins. Turnips require WateringTimeTurnips minutes of watering and PesticideCostTurnips dollars worth of pesticide per acre. Pumpkins require WateringTimePumpkins minutes of watering and PesticideCostPumpkins dollars worth of pesticide per acre. The farmer has TotalWateringTime minutes available for watering and TotalPesticideBudget dollars available to spend on pesticide. The revenue per acre of turnips is RevenueTurnips and the revenue per acre of pumpkins is RevenuePumpkins. Determine the number of acres of each crop to maximize the farmer's total revenue.

WateringTimeTurnips.description: Watering time required per acre of turnips

PesticideCostTurnips.description: Pesticide cost per acre of turnips

WateringTimePumpkins.description: Watering time required per acre of pumpkins

PesticideCostPumpkins.description: Pesticide cost per acre of pumpkins

constraints.description: The total land allocated to turnips and pumpkins cannot exceed TotalLand.
The total watering time required for turnips and pumpkins cannot exceed TotalWateringTime.
The total pesticide cost for turnips and pumpkins cannot exceed TotalPesticideBudget.

objective.description: Total revenue is the sum of the revenue per acre of turnips and pumpkins. The objective is to maximize the total revenue.
